Text: thanks for sharing, amazing film now in amazing quality :)
One of the best sci-fi movies of all time. Casual science fiction fans beware, this movie is very slow and very long at 2 hours, 40 minutes.

Thank a lot, I have always loved this movie.
Naah, it's not long and slow, it's beautiful! :D

Tarkovsky said that he usually makes the beginning extra boring in the first 20minutes so people can get away, so if one enjoy the beginning, it'll be better. And he usually filmed longer then necessary to avoid loosing too much stuff due to censoring.  An awesome director.

I'll seed long and hard.
